The United States commits to cease the application of, and to seek legislative action to terminate or modify to effectuate the termination of, all nuclear-related sanctions as specified in Sections 4.1-4.9, and to terminate Executive Orders 13574, 13590, 13622, and 13645, and Sections 5-7 and 15 of Executive Order 13628, in accordance with Annex V.

The sanctions to be ceased and terminated include:

**Financial and Banking Measures**

* Sanctions on transactions with individuals and entities listed in Attachment 3, including the Central Bank of Iran, National Iranian Oil Company, and others (Section 4.1.1)
* Sanctions on the Iranian Rial (Section 4.1.2)
* Sanctions on providing US banknotes to the Government of Iran (Section 4.1.3)
* Bilateral trade limitations on Iranian revenues held abroad (Section 4.1.4)
* Sanctions on purchasing, subscribing to, or facilitating the issuance of Iranian sovereign debt (Section 4.1.5)
* Sanctions on financial messaging services to the CBI and Iranian financial institutions (Section 4.1.6)
* Sanctions on associated services for each of the above categories (Section 4.1.7)

**Insurance Measures**

* Sanctions on providing underwriting services, insurance, or re-insurance in connection with activities consistent with this JCPOA (Section 4.2.1)

**Energy and Petrochemical Sectors**

* Efforts to reduce Iran's crude oil sales, including limitations on quantities sold and nations that can purchase Iranian crude oil (Section 4.3.1)
* Sanctions on investment, including participation in joint ventures, goods, services, information, technology, and technical expertise and support for Iran's oil, gas, and petrochemical sectors (Section 4.3.2)
